Introduction
Fabiana Gallardo currently works at the Museo de La Plata, National University of La Plata. Fabiana does research in Entomology. Their current project is "Diversidad de parasitoides del orden Hymenoptera (Cynipoidea, Chalcidoidea, Platygastroidea y Diaprioidea) de la regiÃ³n Neotropical"
